description: an intricately patterned, multi-color rug serves as the background for several prints carefully placed just right of center; a brown feather with yellow specks rests next to an orange and yellow print at left, and two netsuke, one green and one yellow, sit on top of two prints at right; a brown and black turtle shell is directly above the two prints at right; a spray of cherry blossoms enters the image frame at right; a brown, black, white, and red bird is perched atop a brown wooden cage in the ULC
signed: in pencil in cream margin directily under image in LRC: [Katja]; in pencil in cream margin directly below image at LLC: [A Lane of Yellow Led the Eye]
title: A Lane of Yellow Led the Eye
